Doing web things since 1997.

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they), a researcher, designer, queer facilitator, and IndieWeb advocate from Amsterdam. If you found anything on this website of value and want to say thank you, you can support me via Ko-Fi or PayPal.
